        public static Date getAfterDate(List<Date> dateList,
                                Date refDate)
        get next date after reference date.
        Parameters:
        dateList - list of dates
        refDate - reference date, must be part of dateList
        Returns:

      • getBeforeDate

        public static Date getBeforeDate(List<Date> dateList,
                                 Date refDate)
        get previous date before reference date.
        Parameters:
        dateList - list of dates
        refDate - reference date, must be part of dateList
        Returns:
